lines.text: Maybe... he wrote the rune on the inside of his robe!
Then when the bullet hit him, it was like the robe was put ''on'' the bullet!
Leavin' aside whether you can really make bulletproof armor by scribblin' on a sheet...
Wearin' that thing around would be real dangerous, if it did that to whatever it touched.
While a guy was pointin' a gun at him?
